name: groupssettings
title: Groups Settings API
description: Lets you manage permission levels and related settings of a group.

parameters.name: oauth_token
parameters.desc: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

parameters.name: prettyPrint
parameters.desc: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

parameters.name: quotaUser
parameters.desc: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters. Overrides userIp if both are provided.

parameters.name: userIp
parameters.desc: IP address of the site where the request originates. Use this if you want to enforce per-user limits.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.desc: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

parameters.name: key
parameters.desc: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

fields.name: messageModerationLevel
fields.desc: Moderation level for messages. Possible values are: MODERATE_ALL_MESSAGES MODERATE_NON_MEMBERS MODERATE_NEW_MEMBERS MODERATE_NONE

fields.name: whoCanContactOwner
fields.desc: Permission to contact owner of the group via web UI. Possible values are: ANYONE_CAN_CONTACT ALL_IN_DOMAIN_CAN_CONTACT ALL_MEMBERS_CAN_CONTACT ALL_MANAGERS_CAN_CONTACT

fields.name: whoCanJoin
fields.desc: Permissions to join the group. Possible values are: ANYONE_CAN_JOIN ALL_IN_DOMAIN_CAN_JOIN INVITED_CAN_JOIN CAN_REQUEST_TO_JOIN

fields.name: allowExternalMembers
fields.desc: Are external members allowed to join the group.

fields.name: customFooterText
fields.desc: Custom footer text.

fields.name: description
fields.desc: Description of the group

fields.name: email
fields.desc: Email id of the group

fields.name: isArchived
fields.desc: If the contents of the group are archived.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: The type of the resource.

fields.name: whoCanInvite
fields.desc: Permissions to invite members. Possible values are: ALL_MEMBERS_CAN_INVITE ALL_MANAGERS_CAN_INVITE NONE_CAN_INVITE

fields.name: messageDisplayFont
fields.desc: Default message display font. Possible values are: DEFAULT_FONT FIXED_WIDTH_FONT

fields.name: whoCanAdd
fields.desc: Permissions to add members. Possible values are: ALL_MANAGERS_CAN_ADD ALL_MEMBERS_CAN_ADD NONE_CAN_ADD

fields.name: whoCanViewMembership
fields.desc: Permissions to view membership. Possible values are: ALL_IN_DOMAIN_CAN_VIEW ALL_MEMBERS_CAN_VIEW ALL_MANAGERS_CAN_VIEW

fields.name: whoCanPostMessage
fields.desc: Permissions to post messages to the group. Possible values are: NONE_CAN_POST ALL_MANAGERS_CAN_POST ALL_MEMBERS_CAN_POST ALL_IN_DOMAIN_CAN_POST ANYONE_CAN_POST

fields.name: allowGoogleCommunication
fields.desc: Is google allowed to contact admins.

fields.name: allowWebPosting
fields.desc: If posting from web is allowed.

fields.name: customReplyTo
fields.desc: Default email to which reply to any message should go.

fields.name: includeCustomFooter
fields.desc: Whether to include custom footer.

fields.name: primaryLanguage
fields.desc: Primary language for the group.

fields.name: membersCanPostAsTheGroup
fields.desc: Can members post using the group email address.

fields.name: whoCanLeaveGroup
fields.desc: Permission to leave the group. Possible values are: ALL_MANAGERS_CAN_LEAVE ALL_MEMBERS_CAN_LEAVE NONE_CAN_LEAVE

fields.name: archiveOnly
fields.desc: If the group is archive only

fields.name: name
fields.desc: Name of the Group

fields.name: replyTo
fields.desc: Whome should the default reply to a message go to. Possible values are: REPLY_TO_CUSTOM REPLY_TO_SENDER REPLY_TO_LIST REPLY_TO_OWNER REPLY_TO_IGNORE REPLY_TO_MANAGERS

fields.name: spamModerationLevel
fields.desc: Moderation level for messages detected as spam. Possible values are: ALLOW MODERATE SILENTLY_MODERATE REJECT

fields.name: whoCanViewGroup
fields.desc: Permissions to view group. Possible values are: ANYONE_CAN_VIEW ALL_IN_DOMAIN_CAN_VIEW ALL_MEMBERS_CAN_VIEW ALL_MANAGERS_CAN_VIEW

fields.name: defaultMessageDenyNotificationText
fields.desc: Default message deny notification message

fields.name: includeInGlobalAddressList
fields.desc: If this groups should be included in global address list or not.

fields.name: maxMessageBytes
fields.desc: Maximum message size allowed.

fields.name: sendMessageDenyNotification
fields.desc: Should the member be notified if his message is denied by owner.

fields.name: showInGroupDirectory
fields.desc: Is the group listed in groups directory

methods.name: patch
methods.desc: Updates an existing resource. This method supports patch semantics.
